languages.text: {n}Обхватив руками маску, Блеф начинает медленно отдирать ее от лица, театрально корчась и всхлипывая. Вдруг стоны переходят в булькающий хохот, и скоморох убирает руки от маски.{/n} "Шутка! У тебя еще будет время рассмотреть это лицо. Очень внимательно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Обхватив руками маску, Блеф начинает медленно отдирать ее от лица, театрально корчась и всхлипывая. Вдруг стоны переходят в булькающий хохот, и скоморох убирает руки от маски.{/n} "Шутка! У тебя еще будет время рассмотреть это лицо. Очень внимательно".
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.text: {n}Wrapping his hands around the mask, Bluff begins to slowly pull it away from his face, squirming and sobbing theatrically. Suddenly, the moans turn to gurgling laughter, and the fool removes his hands from the mask.{/n} "A jest! You'll have time to examine this face. Very thoroughly."
languages.original_text: {n}Обхватив руками маску, Блеф начинает медленно отдирать ее от лица, театрально корчась и всхлипывая. Вдруг стоны переходят в булькающий хохот, и скоморох убирает руки от маски.{/n} "Шутка! У тебя еще будет время рассмотреть это лицо. Очень внимательно".

{n}Wrapping his hands around the mask, Bluff begins to slowly pull it away from his face, squirming and sobbing theatrically. Suddenly, the moans turn to gurgling laughter, and the fool removes his hands from the mask.{/n} "A jest! You'll have time to examine this face. Very thoroughly."

languages.text: {n}闹闹双手捂住了面具，慢慢将面具从脸上扯开。他一边扯着面具，一遍扭动着身体，戏剧性地抽泣着。突然之间，呻吟声变成了大笑声，小丑甩开了双手。{/n}“开个玩笑！你会有时间好好看看这张脸的，到时候你可以看个清楚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Wrapping his hands around the mask, Bluff begins to slowly pull it away from his face, squirming and sobbing theatrically. Suddenly, the moans turn to gurgling laughter, and the fool removes his hands from the mask.{/n} "A jest! You'll have time to examine this face. Very thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}闹闹双手捂住了面具，慢慢将面具从脸上扯开。他一边扯着面具，一遍扭动着身体，戏剧性地抽泣着。突然之间，呻吟声变成了大笑声，小丑甩开了双手。{/n}“开个玩笑！你会有时间好好看看这张脸的，到时候你可以看个清楚。”

languages.text: {n}Farol se agarra la máscara con ambas manos y la separa lentamente de su rostro entre sollozos y aspavientos histriónicos. De repente sus lamentos se trocan en una carcajada gutural y el bufón retira las manos de la máscara.{/n} «¡Es broma! Ya tendrá ocasión de examinar esta cara. De sobra».
languages.original_text: {n}Wrapping his hands around the mask, Bluff begins to slowly pull it away from his face, squirming and sobbing theatrically. Suddenly, the moans turn to gurgling laughter, and the fool removes his hands from the mask.{/n} "A jest! You'll have time to examine this face. Very thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Farol se agarra la máscara con ambas manos y la separa lentamente de su rostro entre sollozos y aspavientos histriónicos. De repente sus lamentos se trocan en una carcajada gutural y el bufón retira las manos de la máscara.{/n} «¡Es broma! Ya tendrá ocasión de examinar esta cara. De sobra».

languages.text: {n}Ellerini maskenin etrafına dolayan Kurusıkı, onu yüzünden yavaşça çekmeye başlıyor. Teatral bir şekilde kıvranıp hıçkırıyor. İniltileri aniden hırıltılı kahkahalara dönüşüyor ve soytarı, ellerini maskeden çekiyor.{/n} "Şaka yaptım! Bu yüzü etraflıca incelemeye zamanın olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Wrapping his hands around the mask, Bluff begins to slowly pull it away from his face, squirming and sobbing theatrically. Suddenly, the moans turn to gurgling laughter, and the fool removes his hands from the mask.{/n} "A jest! You'll have time to examine this face. Very thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ellerini maskenin etrafına dolayan Kurusıkı, onu yüzünden yavaşça çekmeye başlıyor. Teatral bir şekilde kıvranıp hıçkırıyor. İniltileri aniden hırıltılı kahkahalara dönüşüyor ve soytarı, ellerini maskeden çekiyor.{/n} "Şaka yaptım! Bu yüzü etraflıca incelemeye zamanın olacak."

languages.text: {n}仮面を両手でつかみ、ブラフは芝居気たっぷりに身もだえし、すすり泣きながら、彼の顔からそれをゆっくりと外し始める。突然、嘆きが喉をごほごほ鳴らす笑い声に変わり、道化はその仮面から手をどける。{/n}「冗談だ！この顔を調べる時間はある。徹底的にな」
languages.original_text: {n}Wrapping his hands around the mask, Bluff begins to slowly pull it away from his face, squirming and sobbing theatrically. Suddenly, the moans turn to gurgling laughter, and the fool removes his hands from the mask.{/n} "A jest! You'll have time to examine this face. Very thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}仮面を両手でつかみ、ブラフは芝居気たっぷりに身もだえし、すすり泣きながら、彼の顔からそれをゆっくりと外し始める。突然、嘆きが喉をごほごほ鳴らす笑い声に変わり、道化はその仮面から手をどける。{/n}「冗談だ！この顔を調べる時間はある。徹底的にな」

languages.text: {n}Se saisissant du masque, Bluff commence à l'éloigner lentement de son visage tout en se tortillant et en sanglotant de façon exagérée. Les gémissements se transforment soudain en rires gargouillant tandis qu'il retire ses mains du masque.{/n} « Je plaisantais ! Vous aurez tout le temps d'examiner ce visage. Et de très près. »
languages.original_text: {n}Wrapping his hands around the mask, Bluff begins to slowly pull it away from his face, squirming and sobbing theatrically. Suddenly, the moans turn to gurgling laughter, and the fool removes his hands from the mask.{/n} "A jest! You'll have time to examine this face. Very thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se saisissant du masque, Bluff commence à l'éloigner lentement de son visage tout en se tortillant et en sanglotant de façon exagérée. Les gémissements se transforment soudain en rires gargouillant tandis qu'il retire ses mains du masque.{/n} « Je plaisantais ! Vous aurez tout le temps d'examiner ce visage. Et de très près. »

languages.text: {n}Bluff legt seine Hände über die Maske und beginnt langsam, sie sich vom Gesicht zu ziehen, wobei er sich theatralisch windet und schluchzt. Plötzlich verwandelt sich das Stöhnen in ein gurgelndes Lachen und der Narr nimmt seine Hände wieder von der Maske.{/n} "Ein Scherz! Ihr werdet noch Zeit haben, dieses Gesicht zu studieren. Sehr gründlich."
languages.original_text: {n}Wrapping his hands around the mask, Bluff begins to slowly pull it away from his face, squirming and sobbing theatrically. Suddenly, the moans turn to gurgling laughter, and the fool removes his hands from the mask.{/n} "A jest! You'll have time to examine this face. Very thoroughly."
